{{Merge|Java Edition version history/Development versions|reason=Snapshots have been released on Wednesdays since 2014, this isn't a new series.|discussAnchor=Merge}}

The '''Snapshot Wednesdays'''<ref>https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/minecraft-snapshot-25w02a "It's the first Snapshot Wednesday of 2025"</ref><ref>https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/minecraft-snapshot-25w05a "Happy snapshot Wednesday!"</ref> were a set [[Java Edition|Java]] [[Snapshot|snapshots]] and [[Bedrock Edition|Bedrock]] [[Minecraft Preview|previews]] that released between January 8, 2025, to March 5, 2025.<ref>However, January 22nd and February 12th were skipped.</ref> New features were added to Snapshot and Preview every week on Wednesday. They are very similar to the [[Seecret Updates]] from 2010.
